content: > **subscribe to my newsletter and get an exclusive 50% off coupon code for your first purchase > subscribe here 2 ** join my fb group 1 to share your makes get exclusive discounts cal s and free patterns take another step towards zero-waste life and replace your disposable face scrubbies with these beautiful reusable ones the pattern is available for free on my blog return/refund policy due to the fact that it is impossible to return a digital file all sales are final 1 https //www facebook com/groups/220830062977059 2 https //madebygootie myflodesk com/ravelry-sign-up
